0000101111110001 1101000001110011 1 -> sum: 1101110001100101, cout: 0
1010101011100011 0011101111101100 0 -> sum: 1110011011001111, cout: 0
1001011110000001 1100110011000110 1 -> sum: 0110010001001000, cout: 1
1111100011111101 1010010011011100 1 -> sum: 1001110111011010, cout: 1
0110010101011000 0110101001111110 0 -> sum: 1100111111010110, cout: 0
1111101111000110 1100000011000101 0 -> sum: 1011110010001011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
